name: vor-image-client
description: Light-weight client for Rasperry PI 2 to handle web camera

scripts.test: NODE_PATH=. PORT=9090 SOCKET_SERVER=http://localhost:5000 npm run mocha || exit 0
scripts.test-watch: $(npm bin)/nodemon -x 'npm run eslint && npm run test'
scripts.start: SOCKET_SERVER=http://localhost:8080 LISTEN_TYPE=button LISTEN_ID=button-1 SEND_TYPE=pool SEND_ID=pool npm run server
scripts.watch: $(npm bin)/nodemon  -x 'npm run eslint && npm run start'
scripts.serve: npm run eslint && NODE_ENV=production npm run server
